title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 August 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 00:51): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 04:01): GoogleSummerOfCode.WebDAVApi2008 was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/WebDAVApi2008  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 08:38): XWiki.VidyaKhairnar was modified by XWiki.VidyaKhairnar (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VidyaKhairnar  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 09:04): XWiki.VidyaKhairnar was modified by XWiki.VidyaKhairnar (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VidyaKhairnar  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 09:07): XWiki.VidyaKhairnar was modified by XWiki.VidyaKhairnar - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VidyaKhairnar  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 09:12): XWiki.VidyaKhairnar was modified by XWiki.VidyaKhairnar - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VidyaKhairnar  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 09:15): XWiki.VidyaKhairnar was modified by XWiki.VidyaKhairnar - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VidyaKhairnar  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 09:52): XWiki.VidyaKhairnar was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (deleted document) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VidyaKhairnar  
asyd - (22/08/2008 09:52): ola people  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 09:52): ola que tal?  
daning - (22/08/2008 09:53): vmassol: what's ola mean?  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 09:55): Macros.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Removed error in newly add info box. This was not correct.) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/  
asyd - (22/08/2008 09:56): daning: "hi" :)  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 10:21): vmassol: Just so that I am clear. if I attach a .pdf to a page on a wiki that requires authentication. Will the document be protected or will it be viewable by anyone  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 10:24): Bburns: good question. Not sure. You should try it...  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 10:25): the page will not be accessible if the user don't have the rights but you need to check if the download url is accessible or not  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 10:25): if it is then it should be considered as a bug  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 10:25): yes, exactly what I thought. The thing is I am sure I tried it before and the document was accessible but when I try it now it is not accessible  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 10:26): vmassol: are the documents stored in the db?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 10:26): Bburns: yes  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 10:27): ok, well I will try again and at that stage I suppose I will have to assume it is secure?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 10:28): yep  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:39): vmassol: are you there?  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:40): can someone see if they can gain access to a document on my wiki please? the document is at http://www.digitaltv-wiki.com/bin/download/Main/WebHome/test.pdf  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:41): anyone?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:43): Bburns: can you give the url?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:43): (I can't see it)  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:44): oh, strange (vmassol) - > http://www.digitaltv-wiki.com/bin/download/Main/WebHome/test.pdf  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:44): can you see that?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:45): nope  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:45): nope meaning you can't see the link or you can't see the document?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:46): I can't see it  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:46): vmassol: you can't see what I wrote on irc or you can't see the dodument on the wiki?  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:47): \*document  
BC-bd - (22/08/2008 11:47): Bburns: gives me a login required window  
BC-bd - (22/08/2008 11:48): Please Login to view the Digital TV Wiki. For further information please contact [[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:48): just give me the link so access it and I'll be able to try it out  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:48): ok, perfect, thank you (BC-bd)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:48): Bburns: ah it works actually  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:48): vmassol: I don't understand, I have given u the link twice  
BC-bd - (22/08/2008 11:48): Bburns: you are welcome  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:48): I could only see a question mark in my irc client  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:48): but clicking on it worked anyway  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:48): ah ok  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:48): so yes I also have a login windows  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:48): s/windows/window  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:49): aok so we reckon the document is safe?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:49): I don't know  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:49): I can't see the url you sent  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:49): was it a url using the download action?  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:49): http://www. digitaltv-wiki. com/bin/download/Main/WebHome/test. pdf  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:50): can you see that?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:50): yep  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:50): I have put a space after every .  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:51): yes it"'s safe  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 11:51): you're safe  
Bburns - (22/08/2008 11:51): ok great, thank you  
daning - (22/08/2008 12:12): vmassol: I think I finish the code clean and the document. I will send a email to the dev list soon.  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 12:13): daning: cool ok  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 12:20): Design.OfficeConverter was modified by xwiki:XWiki.daning - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/OfficeConverter  
daning - (22/08/2008 12:34): vmassol: OK. I submit the code and send the email to the list. I will work on the xhtmlparser and htmlcleaner.   
vmassol - (22/08/2008 12:35): daning: so it means I can review it for inclusion right?  
daning - (22/08/2008 12:35): vmassol: I will follow the plan in http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/OfficeConverter#HConvertxhtmltoxwikisyntax20  
daning - (22/08/2008 12:35): vmassol: Yes. You can review now.   
vmassol - (22/08/2008 12:36): daning: ok will do this afternoon  
daning - (22/08/2008 12:36): vmassol: I gonna to have dinner. See you.  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 12:36): bfn  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 12:46): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 12:59): vmassol: Is it possible to get the value of a xwiki.cfg param in velocity? I have the xwiki.wysiwygnew param for enabling/disabling the new editor. I'd like to get its value in a template like edit.vm  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 13:02): there is a Param method in XWiki, but AFAIK is not accessile in the api. If I write $context.xwiki.Param I might have problems regarding the with programing rights, no?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 13:16): mflorea: going for lunch now. I don't know the answer, would need to search for it  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 13:16): :) ok, thanks  
gpaul44 - (22/08/2008 13:57): vmassol: has anybody corrected the bug from administration>groups ?  
gpaul44 - (22/08/2008 13:57): the tests from UserGroupsRightsManagement are failing because of it  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 13:57): gpaul44: I don't think so. It needs to be done ASAP though and before the 1.6M1 release  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 13:57): gpaul44: I thought you were looking into it actually :)  
gpaul44 - (22/08/2008 13:57): vmassol: I'll start look into it  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 13:58): gpaul44: ok that will help a lot thanks  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 14:26): Community.CodeStyle was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/CodeStyle  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 14:28): Community.CodeStyle was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/CodeStyle  
gpaul44 - (22/08/2008 15:06): vmassol: I and marius found the problem  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:06): gpaul44: ah great do you know what caused the regression?  
gpaul44 - (22/08/2008 15:06): check this http://pastebin.com/m4b7a18c4  
gpaul44 - (22/08/2008 15:07): this is the reason why the groups doesn't appear in the table  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:07): gpaul44: ok but you do know what commit caused the regression,  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:07): ?  
gpaul44 - (22/08/2008 15:08): now with marius will look over it...  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:08): ok  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:52): thomasmortagne: wdyt about moving IncludeMacroTest to macro/macroinclude\*.test files?  
daning - (22/08/2008 15:53): vmassol: I read your review reply. I will fix it now.  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:53): daning: let me know if you have questions  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:53): daning: there are some design things to fix like the removal of Util  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:53): util in general means a design problem  
daning - (22/08/2008 15:53): vmassol: I will reply the review later if I have. I will them first ;)  
daning - (22/08/2008 15:54): vmassol: I will think of them myself first ;)  
thomasmortagne - (22/08/2008 15:55): vmassol: yes would be better  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:55): ok I'll do it then  
thomasmortagne - (22/08/2008 15:55): I did it fr toc macro  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 15:59): thomasmortagne: not so easy actually... I need to create a way in the test fwk to have mock components per test  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 16:48): UserGuide.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 16:59): FAQ.HowcaniextendtheNewPagepaneltoincludeanotheroptionforegNewFAQ was modified by XWiki.rajeevsa - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/HowcaniextendtheNewPagepaneltoincludeanotheroptionforegNewFAQ  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 16:59): mflorea: note that ideally you should have created a configuration module jira issue  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 16:59): UserGuide.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 16:59): FAQ.HowcaniextendtheNewPagepaneltoincludeanotheroptionforegNewFAQ was modified by XWiki.rajeevsa (Rollback to version 1.1) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/HowcaniextendtheNewPagepaneltoincludeanotheroptionforegNewFAQ  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:00): FAQ.HowcaniextendtheNewPagepaneltoincludeanotheroptionforegNewFAQ was modified by XWiki.rajeevsa (deleted document) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/HowcaniextendtheNewPagepaneltoincludeanotheroptionforegNewFAQ  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:00): vmassol: a configuration module and a jira issue?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:00): mflorea: you've modified the tools configuration module  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:01): but the issue you've referred to is for xwiki core  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:01): so when we do the release there won't be any issue for tools configuration module and we might forget to release it   
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:01): ok, I got it. What can I do to solve this?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:01): just create an issue in the tools configuration jira project  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:01): it's super important but better do it right I think  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:01): s/super/not super/  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:02): it's more a reminder for us to release it  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:02): (since this is not very user oriented)  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:03): I should do the same with enterprise, application/panels, etc?  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:04): should I create issues for each module I change?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:05): yes for all modules you modify... it's a pain, I know but since they all have different release cycles, I don't see how we can do otherwise. I'd love to find a way though.  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:05): s/modules/jira modules  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:05): ok :( it'll take some time  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:06): if you have a better idea let me know! :)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:08): mflorea: the version should be aligned  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:08): so you need to remove   <version>0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:09): vmassol: what do you mean by aligned?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:09): 1.6-SNAPSHOT   
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:09): for all  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:09): since platform web is released all together  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): also I'm not too fond of this (we should remove it for 1.6 release):  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): +  <!-- This is needed for debuging the new WYSIWYG in hosted mode -->  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): +  <servlet>  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): +    <servlet-name>  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:10): ok, though not so intuitive  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): +      com.xpn.xwiki.wysiwyg.server.WysiwygServiceImpl/com.xpn.xwiki.wysiwyg.Wysiwyg/WysiwygService  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): +    </servlet-name>  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): +    <servlet-class>com.xpn.xwiki.wysiwyg.server.WysiwygServiceImpl</servlet-class>  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): +  </servlet>  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:10): mflorea: the only other solution is to release them separately  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:11): which means one jira project for each  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:11): so far we've always released them together  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:11): and more jira issues  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:11): yep :)  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:12): about the debugging thing. It'll be a pain for me to change all this thing back when I need to debug  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:12): mflorea: I didn't say this  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:12): oh  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:12): all I said is that it should not be in our releases  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:13): final, or including milestones?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:13): I'm worried about 2 things  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:13): 1) security  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:13): 2) performance  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:13): although for 2) I hope it's not affecting anything  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:14): here's an idea for you:  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:14): you could have a profile that adds it by doing a merge in the main web.xml for example  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:14): not that it's very easy  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:14): :) merge.. cargo doesn't merge  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:15): why do you say this? :)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:15): it does merge  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:15): I tried to use cargo for my wysiwyg-demo  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:16): http://cargo.codehaus.org/Merging+WAR+files  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:17): "Currently only the contextParams collection can be controlled for merging - this will be eventually extended to all the sections within the web.xml file."  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:17): mflorea: wdyt about changing wysiwygNewReady for isNewWysiwygActive ?  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:18): I'm ok with it  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:18): mflorea: I'd be very surprised if cargo couldn't merge servlet sections  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:19): I hope it does. But I remember I tried it without success.  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:19): mflorea: but that's not an issue anyway  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:19): (since it would be extra easy to add anything we needed if it were not supported)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:20): what' s more complex is that you'd ned another maven module  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:20): :)  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:21): Is it ok to leave it (web.xml) like this for now, and I'll try to change it (cargo or something else) before the final release (or rc)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:25): yes  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:25): mflorea: yes  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:26): great  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:27): vmassol: what jira project has platform-web-standard associated?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:27): mflorea: core  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:27): thanks  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:27): mflorea: we're releasing them together  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:28): ok  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:29): and what component? web services?  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:29): oh, templates..  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:29): mflorea: depends what you've modified  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:29): but not web services  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:29): that's for XMLRPC/SOAP  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:29): could be templates  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:29): or more  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:29): I changed some tempaltes  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:29): (you can choose more than one if required)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:29): then "Templates" :)  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:32): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:32): vmassol: I'll change wysiwygNewReady to isNewWysiwygActive, right?  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:34): Design.NewWysiwygEditorInterface was modified by xwiki:XWiki.GuillaumeLerouge - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/NewWysiwygEditorInterface  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:34): mflorea: it was a suggestion since I didn't find wysiwygNewReady very explicit ;)  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:35): :) I agree with you. So I'm commiting right now  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:35): ok  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:37): vmassol: should I close these \_notification\_ issues after the commit?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:38): mflorea: not sure what you mean by notifications but yes jira issues should be closed when done  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:38): I mean: they notifiy you about the need to release :)  
daning - (22/08/2008 17:43): vmassol: I will add @since 1.6M1 to all the class, right?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:43): daning: yes  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:46): UserGuide.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:47): UserGuide.EditVideo was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/EditVideo  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:51): UserGuide.EditVideo was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/EditVideo  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:51): mflorea: you should remove the <version> altogether  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:52): it's inherited from its parent  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:52): oh, I see (so many things I don't know)  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:53): UserGuide.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:53): UserGuide.CreateVideo was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/CreateVideo  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:54): vmassol: for the WysiwygPlugin where is the right place to open an issue?  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:55): core/plugin-other?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:55): mflorea: where are you putting it?  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:55): platform/plugins  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:55): I'm personally not sure about this plugin but well...   
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:55): ok then you need to create a jira project for it  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:56): we'll also need to release it when we release XE  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:56): the reason I wasn't sure about it is that creating a new plugin is a very heavy process  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:56): re the plugin, I had no other option  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:56): UserGuide.CreateVideo was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/CreateVideo  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:56): so for me it's not worth it for just this single method  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:56): anyway  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:56): I think you should try being the release manager at some point  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:56): so that you can learn the release process too  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:57): we should all do it  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:57): so far: sergiu, jerome, thomas, jv and myself (maybe Anca too) have done it  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:57): yes, I should, I learned something today already  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:58): re the plugin I still don't understand the issue  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 17:58): UserGuide.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:58): I think we're simply missing an api to get a configuration param   
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:59): but it's true it's cleaner to go through some code that handles it  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:59): it's just quite heavy  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 17:59): anyway you should create the jira project then  
mflorea - (22/08/2008 17:59): yes. But this plugin could be extended in the future  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 18:00): it's the "could" that I don't like ;)  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 18:00): in programming it's called the YAGNI principle  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 18:00): YAGNI = You Ain't Gonna Need It ;)  
xwikibot - (22/08/2008 18:00): UserGuide.InsertVideo was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ToussaintWattinne - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/UserGuide/InsertVideo  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 18:01): (it's an XP principle to prevent overengineering and based on observation that in most cases things that could happen don't happen)  
daning - (22/08/2008 18:02): vmassol: what does this "@version $Id: $" mean?  
daning - (22/08/2008 18:02): vmassol: $Id?  
vmassol - (22/08/2008 18:02): daning: it's expanded by your svn client when you commit and it contains information on the last author and last commit date
